Helper class for working with display-objects

Static Methods

inline rotateAroundCenter(target : prime.gui.display.IDisplayObject, rotation : Float) : Void

Rotates an DisplayObject with its origin in the center

inline scaleAroundCenter(target : prime.gui.display.IDisplayObject, scaleX : Float, scaleY : Float) : Void

Scales an DisplayObject with its origin in the center
